mapper.select: select from user where uname like concat('%',#{user.uname},'%') order by uid desc
select count(*) from user where uname like concat('%',#{user.uname},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into user(uname, upass, uage, usex) values(#{user.uname},#{user.upass},#{user.uage},#{user.usex})
mapper.update: update user set uname = #{uname},upass=#{upass},uage=#{uage},usex=#{usex} where uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: select count(1) from user where uname=#{uname}
select from user where uname=#{uname} and upass=#{upass}
